snippet: WHITMAN--Helen (nee Samson), age 89 of Westport, CT, passed away January 15, 2016. Wife of her cherished Edward for 70 years- living a love usually reserved for poets and dreamers; sister of Gloria Levinson; mother, grandmother, aunt, and great-aunt. Helen was a person of extraordinary character and quality always shining a light of joy, class, kindness, and inspiration that nurtured her family. Loved and admired by the people who knew her, she was the unequivocal proof that one person can make a difference, and she did so in the most beautiful way. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WHITMAN--Helen (nee Samson), age 89 of Westport, CT, passed away January 15, 2016. Wife of her cherished Edward for 70 years- living a love usually reserved for poets and dreamers; sister of Gloria Levinson; mother, grandmother, aunt, and great-aunt. Helen was a person of extraordinary character and quality always shining a light of joy, class, kindness, and inspiration that nurtured her family. Loved and admired by the people who knew her, she was the unequivocal proof that one person can make a difference, and she did so in the most beautiful way. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WHITMAN, HELEN (NEE SAMSON)
